abstract: BHP Billiton once considered a possible suitor for Alcoa, which began a hostile bid of its own for Alcan, may become a target itself.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton once considered a possible suitor for Alcoa, which began a hostile bid of its own for Alcan, may become a target itself.

headline.main: Could BHP Be the First $120 Billion Buyout Target?
